group_1.textRight: Was this the beginning of the East-West conflict@that everyone has suffered from...?

group_1.textLeft: It happened a long time ago,@so this was not the only radice.
What's more important is that@their felicit√† turned to tristezza.
Yes, Alina is right.
Joy turns to sadness, hope turns to despair.
It's the same all over the world, and in the end, it's@a cycle of humans marching toward destruction.
It was the same in Kamihama City,@where we lived, wasn't it?
Since ancient history, the East and West have been@fighting each other, destroying each other.
Amidst that despair, Tsuyu and@Chizuru found a light of hope,
but in the end they fell into despair@and met their ends in sorrow.

group_1.textRight: That sorrow continued on for a long time...@Nagitan and everyone have suffered too...

group_1.textLeft: Yes, for centuries.

group_1.narration: "And with each passing era, and each passing hour,@mankind continues to evolve towards extinction."
"Even when things are peaceful,@a little bit of crisis,@a little bit of worry about the future,@a little bit of wanting our rights,@a whole myriad of reasons,@it breeds sadness and despair."
"Stone axes and knives became gunpowder,@then nuclear weapons, and now,@with the creation of the new world of networks,@we can hurt people remotely."
"Ultimately everyone always finds sorrow and@despair in the end, not hope and joy.@And yet, we humans endlessly create@environments that lead to that end."
"That's because we humans@unconsciously desire our ruin."

group_1.textRight: Like what happened in Kamihama City too...@That happens because people deny each other...?

group_1.textLeft: It's a small story on a global scale, but we@destroy ourselves by denying each other.
You can see that spirit of destruction, can't you?

group_1.textRight: How can we change it...?@How can we save everyone...?

group_1.textLeft: Ahaha!
It's because we want to be salvati@that we request destruction.
We turn happiness into sadness.@We turn hope into despair.
Because we can't stand our own azioni,
we want to reset ourselves@back to before evoluzione.
We want to vivere proper lives as living creatures.
*Chuckle*@That's an interesting idea too.
I see, humans want to all perish together@and start over from square one.

group_1.textRight: We want to return to our roots@and seek a renaissance of life.
But I still don't understand@what you're both talking about...
